name: Parasite finds a shell.
description:
A game I with for bitsy instead of celebrating Australia day. It's got nothing to do with Australia day btw.

Used bitsy: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
and pixsy: https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy

If you likes, check out the other games on my itch here, and chuck us a follow on twitter: https://twitter.com/Reecyboii
